dict.acceptation: 窗帘，门帘；帐幕之物，幕布；启幕，落幕；
给（窗户或房间）装上帘子；掩蔽；

sent.orig: House because of curtain but beauty, curtain because house but beautiful.
sent.trans: 家因窗帘而美丽，窗帘因为家而漂亮。

sent.orig: Elegant curtain products are the two curtain series of manual and electric.
sent.trans: 雅致窗帘产品有手动和电动两大窗帘系列。

sent.orig: Under the window rail there is a net curtain and a velvet curtain.
sent.trans: 窗帘轨下挂有沙帘和丝绒窗帘。

sent.orig: The automobile sound, may dispose visor curtain or the transparent rain curtain, all-weather uses.
sent.trans: 汽车音响，陕西电动旅游观光车可配置遮阳帘或者透明雨帘，全天侯使用。

sent.orig: The curtain hooks run along a slot in the curtain rail.
sent.trans: 窗的吊钩可沿轨槽滑动。
